title: Project Ekko Suggestions
body: OK, riot plz pay attention to this. i really like the ekko skin coming out but i think it could be easily improved. i watched a vid of redmercy talking about it as well and i totally agree. you should make project ekko's w more visible, it should be more outlined. now on a personal note i also believe that you guys should make his Q look more 'glitchy' its good atm but could be much better with these small improvements

replies.body: Personally, I think ekko could use a nerf and his abilities could use a touch up as you say. Over all though, I don't think it's on the urgent list.
